template.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd" > <mapper namespace="${packageName}.dao.${moduleName}.${className}Mapper" >
<resultMap type="${packageName}.dto.${moduleName}.${className}DTO" id="${className}ResultMap"> <#list attrList as attr> <association property="${attr.name}" javaType="${attr.type}"> <#list attr.columns as column> <#if column.isPk == "1"> <id property="${column.javaField}" column="_${attr.tableName}_${column.name}"/> <#else> <result property="${column.javaField}" column="_${attr.tableName}_${column.name}"/> </#if> </#list> </association> </#list> </resultMap>
<#list relationMethods as method> <select id="findAppInfoSeniorBy${method.name}" resultMap="${className}ResultMap"> select <#list method.attrs as attr> <#list attr.columns as column> ${attr.name}.${column.name} as _${attr.tableName}_${column.name}<#if !attr_has_next && !column_has_next><#else>,</#if> </#list> </#list> from ${masterTableName} ${masterTableAttrName} <#list method.slaves as slave> ${slave.relation} ${slave.slaveTableName} ${slave.slaveTableAttrName} on <#list slave.relationColumns as relationColumn> ${masterTableAttrName}.${relationColumn.masterColumnName} = ${slave.slaveTableAttrName}.${relationColumn.slaveColumnName} <#if relationColumn_has_next> and </#if> </#list> </#list> <where> ${r'$'}{_parameter } </where> </select> </#list> </mapper>
